name: Leviathan Starblade
description: Leviathan Starblade is a vertical scrolling shmups (shootâ€™em up), but along with the standard forward facing guns each player ship also comes equipped with a turret. This turret can fire or swing your Starblade in any direction. The Starblade can be used to cut down most enemy projectiles.

reviews.review_text: Nice game but i like more to play this in a window devs !
